function-help-entry.name: mean
function-help-entry.title: Arithmetic mean of a vector of numbers

description.p: The 'mean' function computes the arithmetic mean of a vector of real numbers. The arithmetic mean simply computes the average by summing all the values together and divides them by the number of values.

argument.label: x
argument.description: This is the vector of real number.

function-help-entry.example: # compute the mean of some random draws from a normal distribution x <- rnorm(n=10, 5,1) mean(x)
function-help-entry.author: Sebastian Hoehna
